DOC.brief_summary: It suggest imbalance TCA-cycle flux β-oxidation may underlie insulin resistance , predispose factor development type 2 diabetes mellitus . Acetylcarnitine concentration suggest marker imbalance . It expect TCA-cycle capacity high ( high oxidative capacity ) , less acetylcarnitine accumulate , improve balance supply demand lipid . The major research objective examine acute exercise result pronounce increase acetylcarnitine concentration sedentary subject compare endurance-trained subject exercise-induced increase acetylcarnitine restore quickly endurance-trained subject compare sedentary subject . The investigator hypothesize increase acetylcarnitine level lower train subject compare sedentary subject , due good balance lipid supply utilization TCA-cycle . Furthermore expect acetylcarnitine concentration restore faster trained subject , tight regulation influx fatty acid . To test hypothesis investigator want compare acetylcarnitine response exercise group sedentary subject group endurance train subject . This response measure 30 minute exercise use 1H-MRS .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Acute Exercise Acetylcarnitine Concentration Endurance Trained Untrained Subjects
DOC.criteria: Normal weight ( BMI 1825 kg/m2 ) Healthy Stable dietary habit No use medication VO2max train subject 50 mL/min/kg VO2max untrained subject 40 mL/min/kg Any medical condition require treatment and/or medication use OR diminishing exercise tolerance Alcohol consumption 20 g per day ( ± 2 unit ) Unstable body weight ( weight gain loss > 3 kg past three month ) Participation another biomedical study within 1 month prior screen visit Contraindications MRI scan : Central nervous system aneurysm clip Implanted neural stimulator Implanted cardiac pacemaker defibrillator Cochlear implant Iron contain corpus aliena eye brain Hearing aid artificial ( heart ) valve contraindicate MRS Subjects , want inform unexpected medical finding participate study .
